sentences: John Waddington was seventeen years old when he started his first band, serving as vocalist, guitarist, and principal songwriter for the punk group The Boyfriends.
The band was short-lived and he joined The Pop Group in 1977, serving as one of their guitarists.
After The Pop Group disbanded in 1981, he was asked to join another post-punk band, Maximum Joy.
Waddington has been absent from past Pop Group reunions and his last performance credit was on Lily Allen's 2006 album Alright, Still.
